body:
The assimp variant up to now is buggy - the subpackage that uses assimp is not
    actually enabled by the DD4HEP_LOAD_ASSIMP flag as the recipe assumes, it will
    enable automatically if it finds the assimp::assimp target (the flag instead
    will trigger an on-the-fly build). This commit fixes this by disabling the flag.
    The assimp dependency is updated to the not-yet-released version 5.0.2, as it
    actually needs the current master or newer, otherwise there is a cmake failure.

To get a working version of assimp, I also add the master branch.
title: [dd4hep] fix assimp variant
